mapper.insert: insert into htc_plan_set (group_id, hos_id, copy_code, acc_year, plan_code, plan_name, start_month, end_month, is_check, method, is_current) values (#{group_id}, #{hos_id}, #{copy_code}, #{acc_year}, #{plan_code}, #{plan_name}, #{start_month}, #{end_month}, #{is_check}, #{method}, #{is_current})
mapper.select: select group_id, hos_id, copy_code, acc_year, plan_code, plan_name, start_month, end_month, is_check, method, is_current from htc_plan_set where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and acc_year = #{acc_year} and plan_code = #{plan_code}

select group_id, hos_id, copy_code, acc_year, plan_code, plan_name, start_month, end_month, is_check, method, is_current from htc_plan_set where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and acc_year = #{acc_year} and is_check = 1
and plan_code like '%'||#{plan_code}||'%'
order by group_id,hos_id,copy_code,acc_year,plan_code
